privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description1: This website values user privacy. Collected data is used solely to improve the service.
privacy.description2: Personal information is not shared with third parties without your consent. Your data is stored on secure servers.
privacy.description3: Cookies are used to enhance user experience. You can disable cookies via your browser settings.
privacy.note: This policy may be updated over time. It is recommended to check for updates regularly.
